scripts.integration: npm run build && PORT=$PORT||5432; DATABASE_URL=postgres://$LOGIN:$PASS@localhost:$PORT/postgres NODE_ENV=integration babel-node ./test/db.setup.js && DATABASE_URL=postgres://$LOGIN:$PASS@localhost:$PORT/example NODE_ENV=integration npm run migrate:latest && DATABASE_URL=postgres://$LOGIN:$PASS@localhost:$PORT/example NODE_ENV=integration npm run seed:run && ./node_modules/cross-env/bin/cross-env.js DATABASE_URL=postgres://$LOGIN:$PASS@localhost:$PORT/example NODE_ENV=integration ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha test/integration --require babel-register
